summary: REQ-21 appears implemented by removing the footer attribution block; Footer.tsx now renders only the copyright and disclaimer. No other requested changes are evident. Two ancillary metadata/state files were modified without being requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state (project_state.json) including projectStateVersion and summary, which was not requested and is outside the scope of removing footer attribution.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove the “Built with … using caffeine.ai” attribution from the footer UI and explicitly listed no other goals; updating project state/summary is not part of REQ-21.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend file summary metadata (frontend-file-summaries.txt), which was not requested as part of removing the footer attribution.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses solely on UI removal of caffeine.ai attribution; updating a documentation/summary file is not requested.
